definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3

sentences.english: Red back home, light fire make life.
sentences.chinese: 紅色跟着回家，人間煙火。

sentences.english: The reflections from the fireworks twinkled in the river.
sentences.chinese: 煙火倒映在河面上，閃爍多姿。

sentences.english: The performance is optimized by using a pyrotechnic igniter as described in the Igniter web page.
sentences.chinese: 性能優化，使用煙火點火器中所述的引爆器的網頁。

sentences.english: Fireworks light up the sky over a grain elevator in Bowlus, Minnesota.
sentences.chinese: 煙火照亮了明尼蘇達州玻魯斯的一間穀倉的上空。

sentences.english: A new ignition system where a two layered centre core ignition system having a pyrotechnic composition is given.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種帶煙火劑雙層中心點火管的新型點火系統。

sentences.english: We heard fireworks crack all over the village.
sentences.chinese: 我們聽到煙火的劈劈啪啪聲響遍了整個村莊。

sentences.english: The children gathered in the garden to set the fireworks off.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們聚在花園裏放煙火。

sentences.english: You make me three fireworks, now only a blurred.
sentences.chinese: 你許我三世煙火，如今只剩一世迷離。

sentences.english: A basic fireworks safety rule is to remain standing when using sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 煙花爆竹安全的一個基本規則是站立時，使用煙火。

sentences.english: The teacher forbad the pupils to let off fireworks in the school.
sentences.chinese: 老師禁止學生在學校放煙火。

sentences.english: After the dazzling fireworks flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum, after the passion of vanity.
sentences.chinese: 煙火璀璨過後的曇花一現，激情過後的空虛失落。

sentences.english: Fireworks flash while red hoods march through a field.
sentences.chinese: 煙火閃爍，紅袍人齊步前進穿過曠野。

sentences.english: Factories making fire-crackers and fireworks or gunpowder.
sentences.chinese: 三爆竹煙火工廠及火藥類製造工作場所。

sentences.english: This semi-dry sparkler has a refined aroma that conquers hearts, especially that of women.
sentences.chinese: 這半乾煙火有一個完善的香氣征服人心，特別是婦女。

sentences.english: Soon after this, the Chinese started making firecrackers and fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 不久後，中國人便製造了炮竹及煙火。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
